meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the class Monocotyledonae, characterized by having one seed leaf.
meanings.sent1: Monocotyls are plants with only one seed leaf.
meanings.sent2: The garden is full of beautiful monocotyls.
meanings.sent3: Why did the monocotyls go to school? To learn photosynthesis!
meanings.sent4: Her love for monocotyls bloomed like a single seed leaf in spring.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully nurtured the monocotyls, watching them grow from tiny seeds.

meanings.definition: The group of flowering plants that have a single cotyledon in the seed.
meanings.sent1: Monocotyls are an interesting group of flowering plants.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the diversity of monocotyls in the forest.
meanings.sent3: Why did the monocotyls start a band? To produce photosynthesizer music!
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the monocotyls stood out like a single cotyledon in a sea of dicotyls.
meanings.sent5: The field was a vibrant display of colorful monocotyls, each with a single cotyledon.
